mean_cn: n.导火线，引信；保险丝；  v.（使……）因保险丝熔断而中断工作；熔合，合并
mean_en: a small wire or device inside a piece of electrical equipment that breaks and stops the current if the flow of electricity is too strong; a long piece of string or paper which is lit to make a bomb or a firework explode; a device that makes a bomb explode when it hits something or at a particular time
sentence: Once the fuse has burned, the bomb will explode!
sentence_trans: 一旦导火线烧完，炸弹就会爆炸！
